[h1] The Good Ol' Days [/h1]
Remember the time when you got your first encounter with the tank?, remember the first time you disturbed a witch?, remember the time that bill sacrificed himself?, remember the first time you got rescued?, remember the time that you forgot the time to do something but you've wasted your time. [b] I REMEMBER [/b]

This game have been my favorite in decades of gaming, I've met many of my friends here and spent a lot of time with them, there are times we are serious and times when it's all fun and games, but most of all there are times you can see the friendship developing as you progress through the game.
